11122.content:
‘What I’m not a lifeguard.’ Joey thought as he felt very angry on why he is not a lifeguard. He got the call and it said that they wanted a lifeguard.” What’s going on.?’. Joey went around the set and finally found the director.

“Hey, what’s with the role change. I got the call back that I’m the life guard. Now the script says I’m somebody else. “asked Joey.

“I know I should have fired that young foolish intern. There was some miscommunication. You got switch role from life guard to boardwalk owner. Your new role is that you
were a former lifeguard that got an injury that cost you your lifeguard career. You fell in depression and filled the void with food. You slowly bought all the lands and shops on the boardwalk. Many people see you as a shady man as you do and underworld connection. “said the director as he explained the new role to Joey.

“Well the role change is okay, but I should have been notified and the new role does cooler like I’m the bad guy.” said joey as he thought about the new role.

“Exactly. You’re the shady owner that is later reveal with illegal chemical dumping and environmental damage. You have three sexy hench women who are trained bodyguards and assassins. You dress in luxury clothes which cover your bulk frame. Your lifeguard body change to a more of hefty fatty body.” Said the director.

“You are doing fine job of getting the body, but it could be a lot bigger. “said the director as he poked Joey’s belly.

“Hold up. I can’t get fat. What about wearing a fat suit. “said Joey as looked down at his belly.

“No can do. All fat suits can’t be worn as the factor who created them recalled as there was chemical that cause the wearer’s skin to break out is rashes and white bumps.” said the director.

“Well I’m not sure if I want the role. “said Joey as he pinched his belly.

“That’s ashamed as you have the perfect face and the actresses who play your hench women want to me.” said the director as he pointed to three sexy women who were
coming towards. An intern came to the director and whispered something in the director’s ear.

“Look if you don’t want the role then tell me by the end of the day shooting, come find me if you want it or not. I have to run there’s a problem in the prop department. “said the director as he sprinted off.

Joey heard his name being called and he saw three sexy women coming towards him.

“Hello. It’s great to meet you. I’m Sandy. “said one of the women who has slight tan skin long curly blonde hair with blue eyes and wearing a pink bikini.

“Same here. My name is Violet” said one of the women who has black straight hair with brown eyes and dark skin. She is wearing a white bikini.

“Same here. My name is Maria “said a woman with a slight Hispanic accent who has frizzy black hair and a golden tan and brown eyes. She is wearing a red bikini.

“Well. I’m Joey. It’s great to meet you and I’m looking forward to be working with you. “said Joey as he looked at his beautiful costars.

“We loved to chat, but we have to report to the costume department for some alteration. Our bikinis are a bit snug and we are worried that we might pop out of them
during a shoot. Here’s our numbers so we can over lines to together and rehearse our movements. “said Sandy as each actress gave Joey a piece of paper with their cell phone digits. They then turned and left. Joey then noticed that each actress has a curvy body.

11211122.content:
'Pop!!!!' the last of Joey's trousers burst open after another long stuffing. Joey lay back in his chair with a sigh of satisfaction, he had become very fat indeed; his belly now overhung his pants, all his clothes didn't fit him, his belly and love handles pushed out in all directions, his face had fattened up significantly with a double chin on the verge of starting a triple chin. His butt grew slightly but in comparison to the rest of him it had hardly grown. Joey loved this life style, he wasn't sure why he hadn't got fat sooner; his only issue was that now he was bigger, everything was sensitive to the touch, especially when he was really full. It was like the nerves in his body were going haywire but in a good way.

Joey stood up and let his body get used to the balance as he arched his back slightly before heading down to the studio to meet the director. He decided to for go any attempt at finding clothes that fit and just went as he was; his t-shirt rested firmly half way up his belly; revealing his very deep belly button and his jeans would no longer do up now that they had popped open.

After a half an hour drive Joey arrived at the studio and knocked on the directors door; he gestured for Joey to come in whilst he finished a phone call; at which point Joey noticed that he had also put on a fair amount of weight over the last month too, buttons strained to keep that enormous belly in and Joey was really eager to see each pop off one by one.

'Ah Joey; good to see you' the director called Mac said as he stood up and walked over to Joey, giving his belly a pat, 'thanks Mac' Joey said giving Mac's very large belly a returning Pat

he smiled at Joey, 'now then....I'm glad you came down actually, there is something we need to discuss' Mac said, 'Oh?' Joey said confused, 'its about your weight' Mac said gesturing towards Joey's rather plump appearance, 'my weight? You want me to lose it?' Joey said in a worried way; he had grown a custom to being fat now he didn't want to stop now. 'Oh god no Joey, its just we need you to gain more!' Mac said, 'more?' Joey said with slight glee on his face, 'yeah, but the problem is, that even though your doing an amazing job...its just, not quick enough... we need you fatter faster' Mac said, 'oh.....well umm ok, not sure what I can do with that' Joey said, 'I thought you might say that; which is why I have arranged.........'

145.content:
'Brandon, is that you?' Mike says to this guy just walking in through the restaurant doors. Brandon was Mikes best mate from college and is manager of the local gym, but Mike had been skipping the gym for almost a year and hadn't seen Brandon in all that time. Phoebe's phone rings so Mike leaves her to her call and goes over to Brandon and gives him a big bear hug almost lifting him off the ground.

'Hey Mike, wow it's great to see you! I haven't seen you in the gym for ages, what've you been upto?' Brandon says.

'I've been working a lot and this is my girlfriend Phoebe' Mike replies as Phoebe strolls over after finishing her phone call.

'Mike, I'm so sorry Rachel's just phoned asking where I am, I was supposed to be having lunch with her but I forgot, do you mind if I go?' Phoebe says.

'Sure' says Mike 'Anyways if Brandons cool with it I'll have lunch with him, maybe hit a buffet and have a few beers'

'I'm cool with that' replies Brandon.

'Thanks you're the best' Phoebe says kissing Mike and leaving.

Just then Mike and Brandon had a proper chance to catch up and both take off their coats and head over to the restaurant bar. It was then that .....
145.title: Bumping into Brandon

1451.content:
Mike thinks back to a year ago, the last time he saw his buddy Brandon. Brandon was tall slim and toned especially in the upper chest region, always cleanly shaved with short dark hair. Brandon was always using the gym equipment at work and kept trim.

Mike looks at Brandon now and notices he's changed alot. Brandon has a small beard and shaggy dark hair which suits him a lot. He's still big in the upper body however looks a lot bulkier and his t-shirt is tight around his waist which shows a small belly which is firm and definitely visible!

'Hey how's the gym going' Mike asks.

'Well I've managed to take on some extra staff, and so I can sit at reception and get the paperwork done. Lately has been great though cause we've had a TV installed for the guests waiting in the reception so I just watch that most the day.'

'Been doing some snacking too?' Mike laughs.

'How do you mean buddy?'

Mike is a little shocked that Brandon doesnt know what he's talking about so he grabs Brandon's t-shirt and pulls it up a little and pats his bare belly. It's small but it's there!

'Oh, this! Yeah I guess I have gained a little, I should step on a scale. But look at you little guy' Brandon says poking Mikes new little belly and giving it a shake. Mike is a little shocked, realises that's the reason his jeans were feeling a little tight. 'I guess I need to step on the scale too huh! Who's have thought we'd turn out like this!' Mike says.

The next day...

14511.content:
“Take that Mike. Brandon. I put on some weight, but you put son twenty-two pounds. The scale never lies. Your bigger than me. “said Brandon as he grinned with his arms crossed over hex larger upper body.

“That can’t be.” said Mike as he went back on the scale it showed him that Mike is heavier then Brandon.

“Don’t worry about it man we have been both busy in the last year, so we couldn’t hit the gym. If you want, I could be your personal trainer. I have some new staff members that can take some of my workload off my hands to free up some time. “said Brandon

“I will think about and call later on that. “said mike as he was inwardly shocked about him being bigger then Brandon.

“Don’t think about it. Let’s get lunch I’m hungry. There’s a great burger place nearby. “said Brandon

Later at the burger place, both ordered a double bacon cheese burger and a large side of fries and onion rings. They also both had large strawberry chocolate milkshake. Mike felt a bit uneasy about eating the food, but once Brandon started to ask about what Mike been going last year. Mike stared to talk about his and Phoebe’s relationship and him being a pianist and is trying to got another lawyer job. Brandon told him about his love live and the gym. Brandon is in a very serious relationship with a girl from the south named Scarlet. Topics change into sports, movies, cars and other guy stuff. By the end of the of lunch both men eat the entire burger, fries, onion rings, and fished their milkshakes. Both of their stomachs were stuffed to the brim and they felt the embrace of drowsiness. Brand paid for the meal and said to call him about the personal trainer option, but that he had to go back to the gym.
Mike felt his cell phone buzz and he answered it and it was….

145112.content:
Mike answered his cell phone.

“Hello. This is Mike. Who is this?” answered and asked Mike on his cell phone as he did not recognize this number.

“Hello, this is Tony from Stonewall law firm. I heard through some of my friends that you are an unemployed lawyer and need a job. I talked to some of my law friends and told
me that you are pretty good. I have an opening in the law firm and was wondering if you could come by week week and we can have an interview. “said the person on the phone.

“Sir, I would love to come by next week and have the interview. I promise sir, you won’t regret your time in the interview.” said Mike with joy in his voice about get a law job.

“Great, see you next week. I’ll text you the address of the firm and what floor level you need to go to. “said Tony and with that he hung up.

Mike jumped with joy about get a better job, while his liked his piano gig at the karaoke bar, the pay was low and the hours were long and he had to deal with drunk patrons.

He then decided to call…
